title: How many percent of do people around the world use technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: A new report from a United Nations agency says that 47 Percent of the world's people now use the Internet. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/worldviews/wp/2016/11/22/47-percent-of-the-worlds-population-now-use-the-internet-users-study-says/?noredirect=on&utm_term=.edb695407d99
